name: Pong In Space
description:
CONTROLS: 

Up and Down Arrows to move

Space Bar to launch ball

Esc key to pause game at anytime

The game works best when you use the full screen button. Some things aren't quite working correctly yet, like how the CPU paddle freaks out a little, but I hope to figure it out soon. This is my first game after learning a bit about Unity. Hopefully it's fun for a little bit :)
